MessagePolicy.Name: Allow Message (Elevate)
MessagePolicy.EmailSubject: Privilege Management - User request for privilege elevation

MessageStrings.Caption: IT Security Policy
MessageStrings.Body: You are about to run this [PG_PROG_TYPE] with admin rights. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
MessageStrings.ReasonError: You must provide a reason before continuing
MessageStrings.ReferText: Click here to find out why this has happened
MessageStrings.RequestReferText: For more information see request reference
MessageStrings.SmartCardWrongCert: Certificate must belong to the current user
MessageStrings.CrError: You have entered an incorrect Response Code
MessageStrings.CrInfoTip: To get a Response Code contact IT Support and quote the number shown on the screen
MessageStrings.CrMaxFailsError: You have exceeded the allowed number of Challenge / Response attempts
MessageStrings.IdpPendingState: Please check your browser to authenticate
MessageStrings.IdpFailedError: Authentication failed. Try again or contact your Administrator for assistance
MessageStrings.IdpIncompleteError: Please complete authentication with your Identity Provider before continuing
MessageStrings.RadiusPromptText: Please enter your Multifactor Authentication credentials
MessageStrings.AzureADLoginTimeoutText: The login request has timed out

PredefinedReason.Text: One-off Task: I need to install an application
One-off Task: I need to run an application
One-off Task: I need to change a Windows setting
One-off Task: I'm troubleshooting an application that does not work correctly
Regular Task: I need to run an application
Regular Task: I need to perform this action as a routine/frequent part of my role
Other: Reason not listed
